name: ATMLiquidityMining
description: It uses specific configuration from ATM Governance instance. This contract implements all the functions needed on Liquidity Mining program.

eventDecorators.name: NotAllowedAddressAdded
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when pendingControllerImplementation is changed. Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

eventDecorators.name: NotAllowedAddressRemoved
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when pendingControllerImplementation is changed. Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

eventDecorators.name: Stake
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when pendingControllerImplementation is changed. Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

eventDecorators.name: TLRWithdrawn
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when pendingControllerImplementation is changed. Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

eventDecorators.name: UnStake
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when pendingControllerImplementation is changed. Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

functionDecorators.name: addNotAllowedAddress
functionDecorators.description: Adds a new address to the blacklisted list. This address will no longer be able to stake on this ATM Liquidity Mining program intance.

functionDecorators.name: getTLRFloatingBalance
functionDecorators.description: Returns TLR floating accrued balance since last Stake(), UnStake(), Withdraw() operation until current block. Floating indicates this balance is part of users TLR balance but is not yet assigned on userStakeInfo[msg.sender].accruedTLRBalance until any of the following operations takes place (Stake(), UnStake(), Withdraw()).

functionDecorators.name: getTLRTotalBalance
functionDecorators.description: Returns TLR total balance ( assigned + floating ) until current block.

functionDecorators.name: gettTokenTotalBalance
functionDecorators.description: Helper function to obtain the total balance of a tToken available on this Liquidity Mining instance.

parameterDecorators.name: tToken
parameterDecorators.description: tToken address we want to obtain the balance.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Initializes this ATM Liquidity Mining instance using configuration params from other contracts.

parameterDecorators.name: atmGovernanceAddress
parameterDecorators.description: ATM Governance proxy instance associated with this Liquidity Mining instance.

parameterDecorators.name: tlrTokenAddress
parameterDecorators.description: TLR Token instance associated with this ATM Liquidity Mining program.

functionDecorators.name: initialized
functionDecorators.description: Gets if the contract is initialized.

functionDecorators.name: removeNotAllowedAddress
functionDecorators.description: Removes an address from the blacklisted list. This address will now start being able to stake on this ATM Liquidity Mining program intance.

functionDecorators.name: settings
functionDecorators.description: The gets the settings contract address from the SETTINGS_SLOT. This address should NOT change over the time. See details in the _setSettings(...) function.

functionDecorators.name: stake
functionDecorators.description: End users stake their own tTokens on this ATM Liquidity Mining program to earn TLR. This operation updates the user stake info for the sender (userStakeInfo[msg.sender]).

parameterDecorators.name: tToken
parameterDecorators.description: address of the tToken they will stake.

functionDecorators.name: unStake
functionDecorators.description: Unstake tTokens from this ATM, no more TLR tokens will be accrued from those tTokens anymore. This operation updates the user stake info for the sender (userStakeInfo[msg.sender]).

parameterDecorators.name: tToken
parameterDecorators.description: address of the tToken they will unstake.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawTLR
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws accrued TLR tokens by sending them to msg.sender owned account. This operation updates the user stake info for the sender (userStakeInfo[msg.sender]).

parameterDecorators.name: tToken
parameterDecorators.description: the Teller token used to mine with.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: amount of accrued TLR Tokens to withdraw.
